name: Awesome-Spatial
description: ![Awesome](media/icon/awesome.png) Awesome list for geospatial, not specific to geoscience but significant overlap.

name: Awesome Open Climate Science
description: ![Awesome](media/icon/awesome.png) Awesome list for atmospheric, ocean, climate, and hydrologic science.

name: Awesome Coastal
description: ![Awesome](media/icon/awesome.png) Awesome list for coastal engineers and scientists.

name: Awesome Earth Artificial Intelligence
description: ![Awesome](media/icon/awesome.png) Awesome list for artificial intelligence use cases in Earth Science maintinaed by ESIP (Earth Science Information Partners, which is a earth science informatics community) Machine Learning Cluster.

name: Awesome GIS
description: Awesome list related to all things Geographic Information Systems (GIS).

name: Awesome Historic(al) Maps
description: Awesome list of resources, databases and tools related to Historic Maps.

name: Awesome Open Hydrology
description: Awesome list of resources and tools related to hydrology

name: Geospatial Data Science with Julia
description: ![Julia](media/icon/julia.png) Introductory book on geospatial data science with the Julia programming language.

name: Auralib
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) / Python package to support investigation of geoscience problems including geophysics, rock physics, petrophysics, and data read/write in common formats.

name: Bruges
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Various geophysical equations and tools.

name: Madagascar
description: ![C](media/icon/c.png) ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Multi-dimensional data processing suite.

name: MDIO
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Open source chunked and compressed cloud storage for seismic data based on Zarr with fast seismic ingestion and export tools – [Docs](https://mdio-python.readthedocs.io), [Source](https://github.com/TGSAI/mdio-python).

name: ObsPy
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Framework for reading, writing and processing seismic and seismological data.

name: OpendTect-Plugins
description: ![C++](media/icon/cplusplus.png) open source plugins for the [OpendTect](#platforms) seismic interpretation platform. See [the docs](http://waynegm.github.io/OpendTect-Plugin-Docs) for more information.

name: OpenSeaSeis
description: ![C++](media/icon/cplusplus.png) Seismic workflow generator and seismic viewer.

name: Pastas
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Open-source Python framework for the analysis of groundwater time series.

name: Pyrocko
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Seismology toolkit.

name: pyVDS
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Convenience wrapper around Bluware's OpenVDS+ Python bindings which enables reading of VDS files with a syntax familiar to users of segyio.

name: pyZGY
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Convenience wrapper around Schlumberger's OpenZGY Python package which enables reading of ZGY files with a syntax familiar to users of segyio.

name: RedPy
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Auto-clustering for seismic events.

name: rsudp
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Continuous ObsPy-based visual display, sudden motion monitoring, and historical replay of Raspberry Shake data.

name: Segyio
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) / ![matlab](media/icon/matlab.png) Fast library for seismic SEGY files.

name: SeisComp
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) ![C++](media/icon/cplusplus.png) Seismic observatory automation toolkit. Autodetection, storage, sharing, processing data and more.

name: Seismic Un\*x
description: ![C](media/icon/c.png) Seismic data processing suite.

name: SeismicZFP
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Convert SEG-Y/ZGY files to compressed [SGZ files](https://github.com/equinor/seismic-zfp/blob/master/docs/file-specification.md) & retrieve arbitrary sub-volumes from these, fast.

name: synthoseis
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Synthoseis is an open-source, Python-based tool used for generating pseudo-random seismic data.

name: gprMax
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) ![CUDA](media/icon/cuda.png) Finite-difference time-domain electromagnetic wave propagation simulator (on CPU and GPU).

name: GPRPy
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Multi-format, GUI-based GPR processing and visualization.

name: RAGU
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Radar interpretation GUI compatible with multiple radar datasets.

name: readgssi
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Fast command line or console-based visualization, filtering, and translation of GSSI radar data.

name: RGPR
description: ![R](media/icon/r.png) Reads, exports, processes, and plots ground-penetrating radar data.

name: dlisio
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Parser for dlis and lis well log files.

name: lasio
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Reading and writing well data using Log ASCII Standard (LAS) files.

name: OpenGeoPlotter
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Create strip logs, drill sections, other plots.

name: PetroPy
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) – Petrophysics package for conventional and unconventional formation evaluation and includes basic well log visualization via matplotlib.

name: Striplog
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Display lithological and stratigraphic logs for wells and outcrop.

name: Wellioviz
description: ![JavaScript](media/icon/javascript.png) – Visualizes well logs using d3.js. Companion to Wellio.js.

name: Wellpathpy
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) – Light package to load well deviations.

name: Welly
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Analyzing and processing well log data.

name: bh_tomo
description: ![matlab](media/icon/matlab.png) Borehole radar and seismic tomography package.

name: Basic Model Interface (BMI)
description: ![C](media/icon/c.png) ![C++](media/icon/cplusplus.png) ![Fortran](media/icon/fortran.png) ![Python](media/icon/python.png) A standardized set of functions for model-model and model-data coupling.

name: PyGMI
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) It is a modelling and interpretation suite aimed at magnetic, gravity and other datasets.

name: BlenderGeoModeller
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) A Blender add-on with a collection of tools for 3-D geological modelling.

name: PyMT
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Python toolkit for coupling models and datasets that expose the [Basic Model Interface (BMI)](https://bmi.readthedocs.io/en/latest).

name: Devito
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Finite-Difference computation from high-level symbolic problem definitions.

name: disba
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Numba-accelerated computation of surface wave dispersion.

name: emsig
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Controlled-source electromagnetic modellers for layered (`empymod`) and three-dimensional (`emg3d`) anisotropic media.

name: Fatiando a Terra
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Modelling and inversion in geophysics.

name: GemPy
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) 3-D structural geological modelling software with implicit modelling and support for stochastic modelling.

name: GeoPhyInv
description: Julia Toolbox for Geophysical Modeling and Inverse Problems.

name: HyVR
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) 3-D anisotropic subsurface models based on geological concepts that can be used with groundwater flow simulators (e.g., [ModFlow](#simulation-and-modelling)).

name: Landlab
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Simulate surface processes using a large suite of existing interoperable process components (landscape evolution, sediment dynamics, surface hydrology, ecohydrology), exensible by own modules.

name: LoopStructural
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) an open-source 3D structural geological modelling library.

name: modelr.io
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) ![Javascript](media/icon/javascript.png) Web app for simple synthetic seismic forward modelling.

name: ModFlow
description: ![F90](media/icon/fortran.png) Flow modelling software distributed by the USGS to simulate and predict groundwater conditions and groundwater/surface-water interactions with additional variants and add-ons.

name: OccamyPy
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) an object-oriented optimization framework for small- and large-scale problems.

name: PyFWI
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) ![C](media/icon/c.png) It can be used to perform full-waveform inversion (FWI) and time-lapse FWI of seismic data.

name: pyGeoPressure
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Pore pressure prediction using well log data and seismic velocity data.

name: pyGIMLi
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) ![C++](media/icon/cplusplus.png) Multi-method library for solving inverse and forward tasks related to geophysical problems.

name: PyLops
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Linear Operators with some geophysics/seismic modules (e.g., pre- and post-stack AVO inversion, deconvolution, Marchenko redatuming, Radon filtering).

name: PySIT
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) A Toolbox for seismic inversion and seismic imaging.

name: ResIPy
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) an intuitive open source software for complex geoelectrical inversion/modeling.

name: SimPEG
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Simulation and parameter estimation in geophysics.

name: ttcrpy
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) ![C++](media/icon/cplusplus.png) Traveltime computation and raytracing on 2D & 3D rectilinear grids and unstructured meshes.

name: XTgeo
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Python library with C backend to support manipulation of (oil industry) subsurface reservoir modelling.

name: DuMu<sup>x</sup>
description: ![C++](media/icon/cplusplus.png) Simulator for flow and transport processes in porous media.

name: ecl
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Reading and writing Eclipse reservoir simulator files.

name: Fesapi
description: ![C++](media/icon/cplusplus.png) ![C++](media/icon/java.png) ![C++](media/icon/csharp.png) Reading and writing [RESQML2](https://www.energistics.org/resqml-data-standards) files.

name: libres
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Tool for managing an ensemble of reservoir models.

name: MRST
description: ![matlab](media/icon/matlab.png) Rapid prototyping and demonstration of new simulation methods in reservoir modelling and simulation.

name: ResInsight
description: ![C++](media/icon/cplusplus.png) ![Python](media/icon/python.png) ResInsight is a powerful open source, cross-platform 3D visualization, curve plotting, and post processing tool for reservoir models and simulations.

name: SHEMAT-Suite
description: ![Fortran](media/icon/fortran.png) Simulator for flow, heat and species transport in porous media including stochastic and deterministic parameter estimation.

name: DeepField
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) A framework for reading and writing Eclipse reservoir data, reservoir preprocessing and interactive visualization.

name: GeostatsPy
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) GSLIB reimplimented in Python.

description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) ![R](media/icon/r.png) ![C++](media/icon/cplusplus.png) Complete cross-platform library and packages for Geostatistics proposed by MINES PARIS – PSL University.

description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) ![matlab](media/icon/matlab.png) ![R](media/icon/r.png) ![C++](media/icon/cplusplus.png) ![CUDA](media/icon/cuda.png) A free, flexible and multi-language multiple point (MPS) (geo)statistics framework including the state-of-the-art algorithm QuickSampling.

description: ![C](media/icon/c.png)  About 80 command-line tools for manipulating geographic and Cartesian data sets.

description: GIS platform, see [Platforms](#platforms).

description: GIS platform, see [Platforms](#platforms).

description: ![matlab](media/icon/matlab.png) Two concepts to calculate the mean SHmax orientation.

description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Application with geochemical plotting capabilities.

description: ![C++](media/icon/cplusplus.png) ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Unified framework for modelling chemically reactive systems.

name: Underworld
description: Computational tools for the geodynamics community.

name: Razorback
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) An Python library for magnetotelluric robust processing.

description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) An open source structural geology package for visualisation of a given stess-state via matplotlib.

description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) MatPlotLib collection of perceptual colormaps for oceanography.

name: Colorcet
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Perceptual colormaps.

description: Entire FGDC pattern library extracted to SVG and PNG for use in geologic maps and stratigraphic columns.

name: ipyleaflet
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) 2D interactive maps and GIS visualization in the Jupyter Notebook.

name: localtileserver
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) A Python package for serving tiles from large raster files in the Slippy Maps standard (i.e., `/zoom/x/y.png`) for visualization in Jupyter with `ipyleaflet` or `folium`.

name: omfvista
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) PyVista interface for the [Open Mining Format (omf)](#miscellaneous) package.

name: PyVista
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) 3D plotting and mesh analysis through a streamlined interface for the Visualization Toolkit (VTK).

name: PVGeo
description: [![Python](media/icon/python.png)](https://pypi.org/project/PVGeo) [![ParaView](media/icon/paraview.png)](https://www.paraview.org) Data and model visualization in ParaView and Visualization Toolkit (VTK) via PyVista.

name: GeoVista
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Cartographic rendering and mesh analytics powered by PyVista.

name: Digitize Heatmap
description: Get numerical data from a heatmap from a PDF format.

name: GRASS-GIS
description: GIS platform for vector and raster geospatial data management, geoprocessing, spatial modelling and visualization, ![C](media/icon/c.png) ![C++](media/icon/cplusplus.png) source code available at [github](https://github.com/OSGeo/grass).

name: OpendTect
description: Seismic interpretation package, ![C++](media/icon/cplusplus.png) source code available at [github](https://github.com/OpendTect/OpendTect).

name: OpenGeode
description: ![C++](media/icon/cplusplus.png) ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Representation and manipulation of geological models.

name: Pangeo
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) A community platform for Big Data geoscience built on top of the open source scientific python ecosystem.

name: QGIS
description: GIS platform to visualize, manage, edit, analyse data, and compose printable maps.

name: Webviz
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Webviz is a wrapper on top of Dash from Plotly which encourages making reusable data visualisation components and dashboards.

name: Webviz-subsurface
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Webviz-subsurface contains subsurface specific standard webviz containers, which are used as plugins in webviz-config.

name: geoVec
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) "Word embeddings for application in geosciences: development, evaluation and examples of soil-related concepts" and an [implementation](https://github.com/JustinGOSSES/geoVec-playground).

name: IsoplotR
description: ![R](media/icon/r.png) A free and open-source substitute for Kenneth Ludwig's popular _Isoplot_ add-in to Microsoft Excel.

name: pychron
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Data acquisition and processing framework for Ar-Ar geochronology and noble gas mass spectrometry.

name: Athabasca Oil Sands Well Dataset McMurray/Wabiskaw
description: Well logs and stratigraphic picks for 2193 wells, including 750 with lithofacies, from Alberta, Canada.

name: Digital Rocks Portal
description: Powerful data portal for images of varied porous micro-structures.

name: Geoscience Australia Portal
description: Comprehensive map-based Australian data portal across multiple geoscience domains.

name: GSQ Open Data Portal
description: Petroleum, coal, and mineral geoscience data from the Queensland resource industry and government, with supporting information from [GSQ GitHub Repository](https://github.com/geological-survey-of-queensland) for Data Models, RDF Vocabularies, and system design. Use of VPN may result in 403 error.

name: ICGEM
description: Hosts gravity field spherical harmonic models and provides a webservice for generating grids of gravity functionals (geoid, gravity anomaly, vertical derivatives, etc).

name: NOPIMS
description: Open petroleum geoscience data from Western Australia made available by the Australian Government.

name: Poseidon NW Australia
description: Interpreted 3D seismic (32bit) including reports and well logs.

name: Quantarctica
description: User-configurable [QGIS](#platforms) basemap for Antarctica with high-quality, peer-reviewed, free and open Antarctic scientific data.

name: SARIG
description: South Australian Resources and Information Gateway providing map-based statewide geoscientific and geospatial data with over 600 datasets.

name: SEG Open Data Catalog
description: Catalog of "geophysical data that is readily available for download from the internet, via mail, or through special request", maintained by the Society of Exploration Geophysicists.

name: TerraNubis
description: The new _Open Seismic Repository_, includes the classic F3 and Penobscot seismic volumes (which both also have wells and other data assets).

name: UK National Data Repository
description: Open petroleum geoscience data from the UK Government (free registration required).

name: World Stress Map
description: A global compilation of information on the crustal present-day stress field.

name: Costa Model
description: A hierarchical carbonate reservoir benchmarking case study.

name: EarthChem
description: Community-driven preservation, discovery, access, and visualization of geochemical, geochronological, and petrological data.

name: Volve data village
description: A complete set of data from a North Sea oil field available for research, study and development purposes.

name: Macrostrat
description: A multiscale, harmonized, and globally-defined geologic map dataset and stratigraphic API.

name: Basic Geoscience Cheat Sheet
description: Cheat Sheet for Basic Geoscience.

name: Geophysics Cheat Sheet
description: Cheat Sheet for Geophysics.

name: Petroleum Science Cheat Sheet
description: Cheat Sheet for Petroleum Science.

name: Rock Physics Cheat Sheet
description: Cheat Sheet for Rock Physics.

name: Project Pythia
description: An education and training hub for the geoscientific Python community.

name: gio
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Geoscience file input and output functions for less-than standard data formats.

name: Open Mining Format
description: ![Python](media/icon/python.png) Versatile mining data standard.

name: Software Underground Slack
description: ![slack](media/icon/slack.png) Community connecting geo\computing researchers.
